Details.Name: sc_card_name
Details.Feature: OCBC Plus Visa Credit Card

Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: 7% rebates at FairPrice stores and Warehouse Club
Up to 18.5% fuel savings at Esso
3% rebate at Popular

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Fee Waiver

Details.Name: sc_cashback_details
Details.Feature: Enjoy 5% rebates at Unity
Enjoy 5% off everything at Fairprice and Fairprice Online
5% rebate in LinkPoints applicable only with minimum spend of $500 Visa transactions outside FairPrice, FairPrice Online and Unity within the same calendar month
Up to 18.3% rebates at Esso, 2% for EZ-Reload, and 1.3% for M1, StarHub, SPH, Town Council bills & SP Services
0.3% rebate on all Visa spend

Details.Name: sc_dining_details
Details.Feature: Earn 0.3% LinkPoints rewards on all Visa spend

Details.Name: sc_grocery_details
Details.Feature: Enjoy 5% off everything at Fairprice and Fairprice Online
Free delivery at www.fairprice.com.sg
Earn 0.3% LinkPoints rewards on all Visa spend

Details.Name: sc_petrol_details
Details.Feature: Up to 18.3% fuel savings at Esso stations island wide
Earn 0.3% LinkPoints rewards on all Visa spend

Details.Name: sc_rewards_details
Details.Feature: Earn 0.3% LinkPoints rewards on all Visa spend
Earn up to 2% LinkPoints rewards on EZ-Reload, telco bills and utilities

Details.Name: sc_shopping_details
Details.Feature: Enjoy up to 50% off at GMarket, ZALORA, Asiatravel.com, foodpanda, Rakuten Singapore, Lazada.SG, Cath Kidston, and many more
Enjoy 3% off at Bata
Earn 0.3% LinkPoints rewards on all Visa spend
